BannerHeadings.subParagraph: Starting from loading to unloading and maintaining the highest standards in terms of safety while in transit, we take nothing to chance.

B2b.subPara: Sending anything has never been easier; with our mobile app, you can track the live location of your shipment, rely onan accurate fleet, and access insights and analytics at the best rates available.
B2b.bFullPara: You will receive a weekly report on your earnings and discounts.

Benefits.bSubParagraph: Join the Olovola team to take advantage of additional benefits including flexible earningsand no surprise fees.
Benefits.bLSubPara: The more you drive, the more income you will earn - It's as simple as that.
Benefits.bFSsub: Find a job where you have the flexibility to decide what days/times you want to work.
Benefits.bSupport: You will receive support from the Olovola team, supporting you with Trip issues etc.
Benefits.bLessBurPara: We handle all documentation relating to the vehicle and routes, so you can drive with peace of mind.
Benefits.bFullPara: You will receive a weekly report on your earnings and discounts.
